attributes.action: Increase the limit on contactless to help stop the spread of coronavirus
attributes.background: Increase the limit above £30 to stop the need to touch the keypad

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The contactless payment limit is set by banks.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
